name: &AI
headline: Professional-Grade AI for Patent Attorneys
description: &AI is an AI-powered workspace designed for patent attorneys. Leverage agentic AI to accelerate entire prosecution & litigation workflows in one secure, collaborative workspace.

founders.name: Caleb Harris, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder/CEO of &AI. Previously, I studied CS + Neuro at MIT, did technical consulting in patent litigation for Fish & Richardson/Gibson Dunn, built out the data science stack at InsideTracker, and conducted ML research at the MIT Media Lab.

founders.name: Herbert Turner, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder/CTO of &AI. Previously, I studied Aero/Astro + CS at MIT, worked on autonomous surface vehicles and applied ML research, fine-tuned LLMs at Google, and was a founding engineer at Kino AI.

generated_description:
&AI is a promising startup founded in 2024 and currently part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, headquartered in San Francisco. Its core mission is to harness professional-grade AI specifically tailored for patent attorneys, revolutionizing how they manage their workflows.

At its heart, &AI offers an AI-powered workspace that streamlines both prosecution and litigation processes. The platform combines advanced tools into one secure and collaborative environment, which can significantly enhance efficiency for legal professionals. Their AI agent, named Andy, acts on behalf of users, deftly handling tedious tasks to allow patent attorneys to focus on more strategic activities.

As of now, &AI boasts a modest team of nine, led by notable figures, including David Lieb, a Group Partner at Y Combinator. They are entrenched in the legal tech space, with a clear B2B SaaS orientation. Their offerings cater to critical areas such as invalidity assessments, prosecution tasks, and infringement analyses. This means users can quickly check the novelty of inventions, drive litigation success through comprehensive validity insights, and identify monetization opportunities—all facilitated by robust AI technology.

Moreover, &AI places a high priority on data security and user privacy, ensuring that customer data isn't used to train its models and adhering to strict zero-data retention policies with third-party providers. 

In a landscape where efficiency and accuracy are paramount, &AI is carving out a niche that not only meets the needs of patent attorneys but also stands to redefine how legal workflows are managed. As they continue to grow, it will be exciting to see how they innovate further in the legal tech field. 

For more information, you can visit their website at [andai.com](https://www.tryandai.com).
